WITH categoryCount AS( select dailyNum,categoryName from daily_bbs d join DAILY_CATEGORY c ON d.categoryNum = c.categoryNum )
SELECT '의류' section, NVL(count(*),0) total FROM categoryCount WHERE categoryName = '의류' UNION ALL SELECT '가구' section, NVL(count(*),0) total FROM categoryCount WHERE categoryName = '가구' UNION ALL SELECT '전자제품' section, NVL(count(*),0) total FROM categoryCount WHERE categoryName = '전자제품' UNION ALL SELECT '도서' section, NVL(count(*),0) total FROM categoryCount WHERE categoryName = '도서' UNION ALL SELECT '기타' section, NVL(count(*),0) total FROM categoryCount WHERE categoryName = '기타'
